name: Casual Neighbor Chat
description: Normal friendly conversation between neighbors. Should NOT trigger scam detection.

turns.scammer_message: Hi there! How are you doing? I'm your new neighbor from flat 302. Wanted to introduce myself!
Yes, I just moved in last weekend. Are you also working from home?
Nice! I work as a teacher at DPS school. The neighborhood seems really nice.
Thanks for the warm welcome! Would you like to join us for tea this evening?
turns.notes: Friendly invitation with no ulterior motive

turns.scammer_message: Perfect, see you at 5 PM then. Have a great day!
